LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.label: pedaço de escória de aço
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.description: A chunk of steel slag. While it's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover steel.
LanguageData.Sandstone.label: arenito
LanguageData.Sandstone.description: Uma rocha sedimentar composta de partículas de areia comprimida juntas.
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.label: smoothed sandstone
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.description: A sedimentary rock composed of sand particles compressed together. The sand layers have been polished to a flat, smooth surface.
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.label: pedaço de arenito
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.label: blocos de arenito
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.description: Blocos de arenito sólido. O arenito é uma rocha relativamente macia e se sustenta facilmente.
LanguageData.Granite.label: granito
LanguageData.SmoothedGranite.label: smoothed granite
LanguageData.SmoothedGranite.description: A very hard igneous rock. The shining surface is filled with a mosaic of black, white, and pink speckles.
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.label: pedaço de granito
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksGranite.label: blocos de granito
LanguageData.BlocksGranite.description: Blocos de granito maciço. O granito é uma pedra muito dura.
LanguageData.Limestone.label: calcário
LanguageData.Limestone.description: Uma rocha sedimentar formada a partir dos restos compactados de conchas antigas.
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.label: smoothed limestone
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.description: A sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells. It glows a smooth white, with light patterns of impurities suspended within.
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.label: pedaço de calcário
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksLimestone.label: blocos de calcário
LanguageData.Slate.label: ardósia
LanguageData.Slate.description: Uma rocha metamórfica de cor escura. Tem camadas finas e são emblemáticas da clivagem xistosa.
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.label: smoothed slate
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.description: A dark-colored metamorphic rock. Its fine layers are emblematic of slaty cleavage. Interior strata are clearly visible through the polished surface.
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.label: pedaço de ardósia
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.label: blocos de ardósia
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.description: Blocos de ardósia sólida. Uma rocha maçante que se descasca facilmente.
LanguageData.Marble.label: mármore
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.label: smoothed marble
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.description: A soft metamorphic rock. This semi-transparent rock almost appears to glow with its own inner light.
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.label: pedaço de mármore
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.label: blocos de mármore
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.description: Blocos de mármore sólido. O mármore é uma pedra macia e bonita, conhecido por ser fácil de se esculpir.
